T02abhnispu:2: jyotibhir vijitaṃ yad asya jagatīṃ jiṣṇv antaratvatamo (?)
T02abhnispu:3: yac cādvaitadaśārṇasaty api parīṇāmo guṇaughaḥ śriyām /
T02abhnispu:5: yat kāruṇyatarāmṛtārdrahṛdayair uhyanti taṃ vajriṇas tair etac caritādbhutāni nijadhīdhāmāni dhāvantu vaḥ //
T02abhnispu:7: tadañcitais tadvacanirmitaughair amogham agryāṃ śriyam ādadhātu //
T02abhnispu:8: iha hi mṛdumadhyakramābhyāṃ subhāvitasamādher adhimātraprajñasya bhagavatā
T02abhnispu:11: sa hi tvāṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca vajradharatvaṃ prāpayitum abhyutsāhavān skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ pratibimbamayaṃ śūnyataikarasaṃ niścinvan /
T02abhnispu:15: dharmadeśanādibhir yathābhavyaṃ parahitāni kurvāṇaḥ parapuṇyāvadhiṃ sthāpayan saṃharaṃś cācintya mūrtir udeti //
T02abhnispu:17: ārasātalam abhimataprasarā ghanaikasārā jvalantī vajramayī bhūmiḥ kalpāntajvalanavanamayūkhajvālāvalīsīmābandhā
T02abhnispu:18: ārasātalam upary atyuccair ghananibuḍajvaladvajraprākārordhve niḥsaṃdhyekakhaṇḍībhūtam upari vajraśarajālādho vajravitānamaṇḍitaṃ jvaladvajrapañjaraṃ tadabhyantarasthitaviśvābjasūryasthapītadakṣiṇāvartabhramaddaśāracakraṃ ca
T02abhnispu:20: tatra pūrvasyām ārāyāṃ yamāntakaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sitaraktamukhaḥ kṛṣṇavajramudgarakhaḍgamaṇikamaladhārī
T02abhnispu:31: tatroṣṇīṣaṭakkyacalasumbhā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇā lalitā īṣaddarśitadaṃṣṭrā vigataśmaśravaḥ
T02abhnispu:32: tadanye vikṛtarūpāḥ sabhrūbhaṅgāḥ piṅgordhvakeśabhrūśmaśravo vyāvṛttadaṃṣṭrākarālavaktrā lalajjihvā aṭṭāṭṭahāsinaḥ krūrāṣṭanāgabhūṣanā vāmanāḥ pīnās tundilāḥ /
T02abhnispu:33: daśāpy ete sahāsanair niścalāḥ pratyālīḍhenārāgreṣv īṣadalagnaviśvābjasūryasthāḥ sūryaprabhāḥ saroṣaṇā jvalanto nadanto 'tibhīmāḥ
T02abhnispu:34: pralayānalapratimamayūkhamukhair aparimitātmakamūrtinirmāṇaiś ca niravadhidhātutrayeṣu vighnaugham akhilam asakṛnnirmūlayantaḥ /
T02abhnispu:36: mukhaṃ tu mūlaṃ śariravarṇaṃ savyavāmaṃ ca yathoktavarṇaṃ pratimukhaṃ raktavartulanetratrayam
T02abhnispu:38: cakraṃ cātibhramaṇān niścalopamaṃ nirantaraṃ sphurad anekajvālākalāpaṃ tasya nābhyantare 'dhaḥsūkopari
T02abhnispu:39: viśālatrikoṇadhavaladharmodayāntaradhaḥkoṇodaragataviśvadalakamalopari viśvakuliśasahitā tadvajrasya digārā yathāyogaṃ vairocanādisamavarṇā vedī ca /
T02abhnispu:41: tasya madhye bhagavān vajrasattvo mañjuvajrarūpaḥ kuṅkumāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravadanaḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ
T02abhnispu:43: tasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi vairocanaḥ sitaḥ kṛṣṇaraktasavyetaramukhaḥ sitāṣṭāracakrāsimaṇikamaladharaḥ
T02abhnispu:48: trayo 'mī kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravaktrāḥ sarve tathāgatā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇāḥ
T02abhnispu:50: nairṛtyāṃ (Am 229) māmakī akṣobhyasamā raktotpalāsimaṇipadmadharā sarvasādhaneṣu tathā pāṭhāt /
T02abhnispu:53: ato garbhapuṭād bahir āgneyakoṇe rūpavajrā vairocanasadṛśī ratnadarpaṇāsimaṇyabjadharā /
T02abhnispu:64: atra mañjuvajravairocanadaśadevyaś candreṣu vajraparyaṅkiṇo 'nye sūryeṣu candrasūryataleṣu viśvapadmāni /
T02abhnispu:65: tathāgatāḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgitā devyas tu svābham upāyam //
T02abhnispu:66: kulādhipatis tu śirasi mañjuvajrāditathāgatamāmakīśabdavajrārakṣācakragatāṣṭakrodhānām akṣobhyaḥ locanārūpavajrāyamāntakānāṃ vairocanaḥ /
T02abhnispu:72: vajrasattvo 'treṣadraktānuviddhasitavarṇo nīlaraktasavyetaravaktraḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgito nīlavajrāsimaṇikamaladhārī viśvapadmacandrāsanaś candraprabho vajraparyaṅkī ratnamukuṭī ratnābharaṇo
T02abhnispu:74: iha mañjuvajrasya stanāntare samayasattvasadṛśaṃ jñānasattvaṃ taddhṛccandre khaḍgamuṣṭicandrasthaṃ maṃbījam /
T02abhnispu:75: śāśvataratneśāmitābhāmoghasiddhyakṣobhyānāṃ hṛdi cihne yathāyogaṃ candre sūrye vā vuṃ āṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ /
T02abhnispu:76: locanādidevīnāṃ Ioṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ khaṃ raṃ /
T02abhnispu:80: iha niṣpannayoginaś cakṣurādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jñānasattvapraveśādikaṃ ca noktam
T02abhnispu:81: // tadantareṇāpy aparimitācintyacakṣurabhijñādiguṇagrāmaramaṇīyamūrter abhīṣṭadevatāyāḥ sakṛd eva supariśuddhasarvākārapariniṣpatter muhur muhur
T02abhnispu:83: hṛnmantrādikathanaṃ tu kalaśādhivāsanādiṣu prayogārtham // yadā tu madhye 'nyas tathāgato bhavati nāyakas tadā madhyasthitas tasya sthāne tiṣṭhet /
T02abhnispu:84: amitābhaḥ śubhro 'pi bhavati śuklā dharmāḥ prakṛtyeti vāgīśasyātra śuklatety ukteḥ // iha vakṣyamāneṣu ca
T02abhnispu:85: mandaleṣu yasyā māṇḍaleyadevatāyā mukhyato yatsthānam ucyate tasmin saiva pradhānatayā maṇḍaleśabhimukhī
T02abhnispu:87: atra kūṭāgārasya vajrabhūmyādiparito vajrapañjaraṃ rakṣācakraṃ dharmodayā ceti trayaḥ parikarāḥ
T02abhnispu:88: tatra vajrapañjaraṃ vakṣyamānānām api sarveṣāṃ kūṭāgārāṇāṃ rakṣācakraṃ (Am 232) dharmodayā ca keṣāṃcid eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
T02abhnispu:89: lekhyakūṭāgārāṇāṃ tu dharmadhātusvarūpadharmodayāyā dharmadhātvantargatasya vā sūcakaṃ likhanam uktaṃ vajrāvalyām // yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmam ity utpannakramamaṇḍalapratipādanākṛtena lokadhātoś
T02abhnispu:93: api ca śūnyataiva bhagavatī nikhilavighnaughaṃ samūlam unmūlayituṃ prabhavatīti tadadhimokṣadṛḍhatvam evādarotpādanāya rakṣācakralikhanaṃ na varṇitaṃ lekhyamaṇḍaleṣu /
T02abhnispu:94: bhāvyamaṇḍaleṣu tu kvacid eva tadbhāvanoktā na sarveṣu /
T02abhnispu:95: vighnaghātānantaraṃ śūnyatāpraveśād bhāvyamaṇḍale 'pi rakṣācakraṃ nāsty ato na likhyate caitat /
T02abhnispu:96: evaṃ tarhi vajraprākāram api cakravāḍasūcakaṃ na likhitavyam /
T02abhnispu:98: nahi bhagavatā vajraprākārasya dvitīyavārotpattiḥ kvacid uktā //
T02abhnispu:100: sakṛd utpannam eva hi vajrabhūbandhaprākārādikaṃ samastasamāropaśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ māyāmayam avatiṣṭhata eva /
T02abhnispu:103: kaiścit tu kvacid rakṣācakram api likhituṃ saṃmanyate //
